text: tame pachala chodela gamavasi'one kahi do ke najika mam ja tame eka sakhata ladaku koma tarapha bolavavamam avaso ke tame te'o sathe ladaso athava to te'o musalamana bani jase, basa! Jo tame anusarana karaso to allaha tamane khuba ja srestha badalo apase ane jo tame modhum pheravi lidhum jevum ke a pahela tame modhum pheravi cukaya cho to te tamane du:Khadayiyatana apase
